actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the U.S. Postal Service.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the United States Postal Service. Provides that the board shall consist of 3 members selected as follows: (1) one selected by the Postal Service, (2) one selected by the supervisory organization, and (3) one selected by the two members selected above in (1) and (2).

titles.title: A bill to establish an arbitration board to settle disputes between supervisory organizations and the U.S. Postal Service.
